text: The 2016–17 Martinique Championnat National was the 97th season of the Championnat National, top division of football in Martinique. The season began on 9 September 2016 and will end on 13 May 2017. == Clubs == Fourteen clubs participated in the Championnat National during the 2016-17 campaign. New Club, Eucalyptus and Diamantinoise were promoted from the second division. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Home city ! title: 2016–17 Martinique Championnat National
